product_name: La Roche-PosayTravel Size Lipikar AP+M Triple Repair Body Moisturizer for Dry Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe La Roche-Posay Lipikar AP+M Triple Repair Body Moisturizer for Dry Skin intensely hydrates to relieve dry and extra dry skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsPrebiotic face and body moisturizer for dry to very dry skinProvides 48-hour hydration and replenishes the skin's essential lipidsDaily relief for dry to very dry skin on the face, body and handsRich, comforting cream texture with a non-greasy, non-sticky finishHydrates and repairs dry skin with shea butter, glycerin and niacinamideOffers prebiotic benefits to help rebalance the skin microbiome with a high concentration of La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal WaterSuitable for adults, children and babies over 2 weeks oldSafe for sensitive skinNon-comedogenicAccepted by the National Eczema AssociationDermatologist, pediatrician and allergy testedKey IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesShea butter hydrates and replenishes essential skin lipidsGlycerin moisturizes and hydrates the skinNiacinamide helps soothe dry skinFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensItem 2606155How To UseUse as a face or body moisturizer for extra dry, rough skin. Apply all over the body on clean skin morning and evening. Gently massage product on skin until absorbed.IngredientsAqua/ Water/Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil / Rapeseed Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Peg-100 Stearate, Propanediol, Ophiopogon Japonicus Root Extract, Ceramide Np, Sorbitan Tristearate, Dimethiconol, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Sodium Chloride, Mannose, Coco-Betaine, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl Glycine, Caprylyl Glycol, Vitreoscilla Ferment, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.
how_to_use: Use as a face or body moisturizer for extra dry, rough skin. Apply all over the body on clean skin morning and evening. Gently massage product on skin until absorbed.
ingredients: Brassica Campestris Seed Oil / Rapeseed Seed Oil

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love this lotion specially the travel size get to put in my purse on the go ready to use on face or body love it

reviews.headline: Hydrates and softens without being greasy
reviews.comments: I've been using this lotion for just over a year. I loved it from the start, but now, I'm noticing the changes in my skin over time. It's so much softer! My elbows feel as soft as the rest of my skin, the only time that's happened since infancy! It's a remarkable difference.

reviews.headline: Soothing Moisturizer
reviews.comments: My fianc√© has been using this as a facial and hand lotion for several years. He consistently has dryness around his nose and mouth. This helps soothe those dry patches and doesn't add extra oiliness or contribute to breakouts in other areas of his face.

reviews.headline: Feel the Difference in your Skin
reviews.comments: When you put it it on it feels thick. As it sets in you can feel the difference in your skin. You'll feel soft and moisturized. The only thing i would say is if it's hot outside and you have leather seats it will look as if there is an oil left behind. Other than that it does the job.

reviews.headline: I had to stop using and throw out
reviews.comments: I read the reviews and was really excited about this lotion, but honestly my skin didn't like it at all. When I put it on I'm super greasy and the product doesn't absorb into my skin. I have leather seats in my car and the product gets all over. I was even transferring product on tables at restaurants. Also it smells just like vegetable oil. I was so disturbed how I smelled with this lotion because I felt like an oiled up pig or something about to be deep fried. Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: I would buy product again.
reviews.comments: Great lotion. Great for dry skin.

reviews.headline: Super Soft
reviews.comments: This is my favorite go to daily moisturizer - it instantly moisturizes and plumps my skin for hours. I am a repeat buyer - plus you get a lot of product for your $$

reviews.headline: Great Body Moisturizer
reviews.comments: It was dermatologist recommendation to me for my very dry but sensitive skin. It is thick feeling going on but my skin absorbs it quickly.  Love it!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Great for literally every where on your body. Thick, rich and incredibly moisturizing without any risk of allergic reaction or acne. I use it for my face and eye cream, makeup remover, body lotion and even chapstick sometimes. I am prone to acne even as an adult and this is just the best. My husband has very sensitive skin and gets eczema often from products and this is his favorite moisturizer as well.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I have been using this for about five years now, and I shared it with my mother and my sister who now also love this product. I mostly use it as a facial cream, but I also use it for my body. I have sensitive skin and my sister has eczema but it works really well for both of us. It is fragrance free and I feel it makes my skin look supple and glowy.

reviews.headline: Great lotion! Bad pump.
reviews.comments: I love this lotion!! It soaks in quickly and does not leave you feeling sticky. My skin stays moisturized longer than with other lotions. My only complaint is the pump does not reach the bottom, so there's about a 1/4th left. You have to cut the bottle.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Totally changed my skin texture. It feels hydrated instead of dry.

reviews.headline: Very moisturizing
reviews.comments: I love this lotion. It is very rich & creamy. This is a lotion that requires you to take your time rubbing in. I like using it after a shower before bed. It makes my skin feel so supple and hydrated. It does not irritate my skin or make the KP on my arms and thighs worse. Once it has sunk into your skin it does NOT leave any residue or feel greasy or sticky; like i said you just have to take that extra minute for yourself & massage it into your skin.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I have DRY facial skin and eczema patches on my arms, and use this for both, works wonders! It's a heavy cream, sometimes a little sticky after applying. Hasn't caused any breakouts on my face either, will be repurchasing again and again

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin
reviews.comments: This is the best hydrating lotion for dry skin.  I'm happy I founds this product.  Don't waste money on other ineffective brands.  I will buy this again and again.  I only wish they would package it in a tub so the product can be easily accessed. The pump and the tube have to literally be cut open to access remaining product.

reviews.headline: Good Skincare
reviews.comments: My dermatologist recommended this brand. I didn't know which moisturizer to choose from however, I'm glad that I went with this one. This keeps my skin well moisturized and I make sure to use it in the morning and evening. It's a must have staple for your skincare routine!

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive, dry, eczema prone skin
reviews.comments: This cream doesn't leave a greasy residue and it's perfect for very sensitive, dry, eczema prone skin. My boyfriend uses it daily after the shower and it has made his facial eczema patches disappear. Will continue to purchase!

reviews.headline: I will be buying this again
reviews.comments: This product is amazing! My whole family loves it

reviews.headline: Disgusting.
reviews.comments: The worst moisturizer I've ever used. I have dry skin and love thick body butters, oils, and emollient lotions but this was just disgusting. It feels like it sits on your skin surface l. Even after 24 hours when you wash, it will wash off slimy.

reviews.headline: Moisture
reviews.comments: Moisture that last all day

faceoff_positive.comments: I am a 77 year old male, white, Irish heritage.  I grew up in Florida, with little regard for sunscreen protection.  Rough scaly skin was my norm.  I began having melanoma problems 35 years ago, and I have been seeing a dermatologist regularly since then.  I live in California now, and use SPF 40 sunscreen.  On my last dermatology visit, the doctor recommended I begin using a moisturizer, and apply it all over my body twice daily.  I had never used anything like this, and asked for a reference.  My doctor recommended La Roche-Posay.  I purchased a bottle, began trying it, and discovered it was easy and quick to apply.  The first day I began receiving compliments on my "glowing fresh" look.   These compliments have continued.    My wife says my skin is much smoother.  I look forward to my doctor's comments on my next visit.   Thank you for developing a product to help "first timers" like me.
faceoff_positive.headline: For Beginners

faceoff_negative.comments: I love this product but the defective pump they sell this product with forces you to waste at least 1/4 of the product.  For the price I paid for one bottle, you would think this company could provide a pump that would actually work with the thickness of the lotion.  I tried to attach a picture that displays the amount of product that was left in the bottle however they will not allow me to attach it to this review.  I'll try to add another review on google to see if I can add this information.  have to cut the bottle in half with a box cutter and scoop out the remaining lotion with a spatula in order to use it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Defective pump sold with every single bottle
